articles.title: 2024 NHL playoff preview: Boston Bruins vs. Toronto Maple Leafs - The Athletic
articles.description: Boston and Toronto are two bitter rivals with a deep history squaring off once more in what should be a very tight matchup.
articles.content:
By Dom Luszczyszyn, Sean Gentille and Shayna Goldman 
Here we go again. For the third time in the Auston Matthews and Mitch Marner era, the Toronto Maple Leafs will face the Boston Bruins in Round 1… [+14312 chars]

articles.author: Gabby Herzig, Brody Miller and more
articles.title: Can Nelly Korda make history, win the Chevron? How many majors for Scottie Scheffler? - The Athletic
articles.description: Korda comes into the LPGA's first major with four straight wins. She could become the first since Annika Sorenstam to win 5 in a row.
articles.content:
The most dominant forces in golf this year have been Scottie Scheffler and Nelly Korda.
So, as we all recover from the Masters and prepare for the Chevron Championship, how could we not get together… [+8489 chars]
